title: Create Comprehensive Test Suite for Widget Customization Features
description: Build complete test coverage for all widget customization functionality including unit tests for widget library management, integration tests for drag-and-drop behavior, visual regression tests for responsive layouts, and E2E tests for the complete user workflow. Acceptance criteria: All widget types have unit test coverage, drag-and-drop functionality has integration tests with mock interactions, responsive layouts have visual regression tests across breakpoints, complete user workflow (add/rearrange/remove/persist) has E2E test coverage, test coverage exceeds 90% for dashboard components.
